title: Lac Cess Act, 1930
description: Official consolidated text of Lac Cess Act, 1930 (XXIV of 1930) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title, extent and commencement
provisions.content:
_(1) This Act may be called the 2[*] Lac Cess Act,
1930.

(d) “lac cess” means the customs duty imposed by section 3.

provisions.title: Section 3. Imposition of lac cess. There shall be levied and collected on all lac and refuse lac 2[exported
provisions.content:
from Pakistan] 5[* * *] a cess at the rate of 6[seven annas] per maund in the case of lac, and 6[five
annas] per maund in the case of refuse lac, or at such 2[other] rate as the 4[Federal Government] may,
